languages.text: {n}Стены святилища смерти то расширяются до бесконечности, то сужаются так, что становится сложно дышать. Пол под ногами пляшет, а статуя Неумирающего, кажется, смотрит на вас свысока и грозно качает головой.{/n}

{n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стены святилища смерти то расширяются до бесконечности, то сужаются так, что становится сложно дышать. Пол под ногами пляшет, а статуя Неумирающего, кажется, смотрит на вас свысока и грозно качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide; the next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor is dancing under your feet, and the Undying One's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

{n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide; the next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor is dancing under your feet, and the Undying One's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

{n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

{n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In einem Augenblick wachsen die Wände des Heiligtums des Todes, bis sie unendlich weit sind. Im nächsten sind sie so eng, dass du kaum atmen kannst. Der Boden tanzt unter deinen Füßen, und die Statue des Todlosen Imperators scheint bedrohlich den Kopf zu schütteln, während sie auf dich hinabblickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In einem Augenblick wachsen die Wände des Heiligtums des Todes, bis sie unendlich weit sind. Im nächsten sind sie so eng, dass du kaum atmen kannst. Der Boden tanzt unter deinen Füßen, und die Statue des Todlosen Imperators scheint bedrohlich den Kopf zu schütteln, während sie auf dich hinabblickt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En un instante, los muros del santuario de la muerte se vuelven infinitamente extensos. Al siguiente, son tan estrechos que te cuesta respirar. El suelo baila bajo tus pies, y la estatua del Emperador Inmortal parece sacudir la cabeza de forma amenazante mientras te observa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un instante, los muros del santuario de la muerte se vuelven infinitamente extensos. Al siguiente, son tan estrechos que te cuesta respirar. El suelo baila bajo tus pies, y la estatua del Emperador Inmortal parece sacudir la cabeza de forma amenazante mientras te observa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬、死のサンクトゥムの壁がどこまでも広がる。次の瞬間、呼吸ができないほどに狭くなる。床は足の下で踊り、不死の皇帝の彫像は威嚇するかのように首を振ってあなたを見下ろしているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、死のサンクトゥムの壁がどこまでも広がる。次の瞬間、呼吸ができないほどに狭くなる。床は足の下で踊り、不死の皇帝の彫像は威嚇するかのように首を振ってあなたを見下ろしているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}前一秒钟，死亡圣殿的厅堂还无比宽广，到了下一秒钟，一切都变得极其狭窄，让人难以呼吸。地板在你的脚下跳起了舞，不死神皇的雕像似乎在俯视着你，充满威胁地大摇其头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}前一秒钟，死亡圣殿的厅堂还无比宽广，到了下一秒钟，一切都变得极其狭窄，让人难以呼吸。地板在你的脚下跳起了舞，不死神皇的雕像似乎在俯视着你，充满威胁地大摇其头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un instant, les murs du sanctum de la mort s'élargissent à l'infini, et la seconde d'après, ils se resserrent à tel point qu'ils menacent de vous étouffer. Le sol tangue sous vos pieds, et la statue de l'Empereur Immortel semble secouer la tête d'un air menaçant alors qu'elle vous toise de tout son haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un instant, les murs du sanctum de la mort s'élargissent à l'infini, et la seconde d'après, ils se resserrent à tel point qu'ils menacent de vous étouffer. Le sol tangue sous vos pieds, et la statue de l'Empereur Immortel semble secouer la tête d'un air menaçant alors qu'elle vous toise de tout son haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir bakıyorsun, ölüm kutağının duvarları sonsuza dek genişliyor. Tekrar baktığında duvarlar o kadar dar görünüyor ki nefes almak bile zorlaşıyor. Ayaklarının altındaki zemin dans ediyor. Ölmeyen İmparator'un heykeli ise yukarıdan sana bakarken tehditkâr bir şekilde başını sallıyor gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One moment, the walls of death's sanctum grow infinitely wide. The next, they are so narrow as to make it hard to breathe. The floor dances under your feet, and the Undying Emperor's statue seems to shake its head threateningly as it looks down upon you.{/n}
